title: Friedrich Merz - Wikipedia
snippet: Joachim-Friedrich Martin Josef Merz (born 11 November 1955) is a German politician serving as Chancellor of Germany since 6 May 2025.

title: Friedrich Merz puts Germany in an unfamiliar position: Out front – POLITICO
snippet: Friedrich Merz has taken a far more active stance inside the EU — assuming a role more traditionally played by France's now weakened President. | Emmanuele Contini//Getty Images · December 16, 2025 4:00 am CET · By James Angelos and Nette Nöstlinger ·

title: The Turbulent Times of Friedrich Merz - The New York Times
snippet: The new chancellor believes the world needs a stronger Germany. He is still navigating how to do it.

title: Friedrich Merz | Politics, Germany, & Christian Democrats | Britannica
snippet: Friedrich Merz is a German lawyer, lobbyist, and politician who has served as leader of Germany’s Christian Democratic Union (CDU) party since 2022 and became the country’s chancellor in 2025.

title: German election 2025: Friedrich Merz on track to be Europe's most powerful leader as America turns its back – POLITICO
snippet: Alors que Friedrich Merz est sur le point de diriger l’Allemagne, son Amérique adorée est passée du statut d’ami indispensable à frenemy.
